title: font with 'lights' in it
content:
i know ive seen this font in my font library before (or something similar enough), but can anyone identify this or suggest something nicer / along the same lines?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [2527519862\_f13152f8d9\_o2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140529083617/http:/typophile.com/files/2527519862_f13152f8d9_o2.jpg) | 90.42 KB |
author: Arran

comments.content:
Hi Arran,

similar, not necessarily nicer: the [‘Ecofont’](http://web.archive.org/web/20140529083617/http:/typophile.com/node/52616).  
See also the fonts linked by Typodermic in that thread.  
F
I believe this face is actually "Budmo Jiggler" by Ray Larabie, which is free.

Nicer/along the same lines are two fonts from Barcelona foundry Type-ø-Tones.

[Mayayo Holes](http://web.archive.org/web/20140529083617/http:/www.type-o-tones.com/fonts.php?id=23)

and an all-caps family with lots of different lights:  
 [Wilma](http://web.archive.org/web/20140529083617/http:/www.type-o-tones.com/fonts.php?id=37)

JM
